name: Purple - Find differences
description:
In our first game we focused on pictures of architecture, nature and animals.

Find a seven differences in the photos with houses, streets, interiors as well as horses, cats and parrots. You also will find a nice pictures of mountains, oceans and rivers here :) You can play any picture you want any time. Use Zoom and Hint to spot hardest differences and make game cosy.

Train your attention with pleasure with best Find differences game series ever!
